About

  • Who am I ?

    Hi I'm João Guimarães, but if it's hard to say, (probably because you speak english) you can call me Jonh.

    I was born in Lisbon, Portugal and have been in love with all that is tech ever since I can remeber

  • What am I about ?

    More than a programming lover, I am first and foremost a technology lover. I love it all, from AI to web development to web design and server management. If it's tech related, I'm on it.

    I'm an ambitious person with a passion for learning, with interest in volleyball, technology and personal finance.
